house_listing.comments: Stunning Home in better than new condition. This home has upgraded features found in more expensive homes including distinctive styling, garden tub in master bath, excellent new appliances including microwave, pantry, full automatic sprinklers and even special outdoor electrical outlets with day/night sensors for your Christmas lights. It's clean and ready to move in to WITH AN ASSUMABLE 7% LOAN!! BRING YOUR CLIENTS TODAY-THIS ONE WON'T LAST.

for_more_information_contact.firm_name: Windermere Real Estate/Richard B. Smith, Inc.
